Html:
Hi!

Just wondering if you guys have any ETA on when next version would be publicly available?

 

Thanks

I too am extremely excited to get my hands on a new release :D

Even if its some way off it would be nice to see a video of the current work or something....you know...just to keep me going :)

Hi guys . We re still in super secret startup mode trying to do "an original game with voxel cube terrain". The team evolved, some team members have less time for the project, some new guys are in with a lot of new expertise !

We are still very serious but sorry, no ETA on the commercial product release, and this opensource project will stay on hold until we can sell our cool game, unless someone wants to commit some things here, but there is no activity in the forks so I doubt it !

that s a good news !

I though this was dead
